name: What the Fuck is Just a Material Thing in Front of my Face? (1/3)
description:
Excerpt #1/3 from the music video "December's Deep Wish", by Twin Render --- a collaborative project between Sky Goodman (visual/poetry) and Joey Meland (audio)

"
The way passing cars and buildings 
make a world, a future place. The way I learn to accept
what the fuck is just a material thing in front of my face. 

And what a struggle it has been all these years
to be in this body and to accept the body. 
Body not just as my body but body as car, 
body as building, body as face
anything tangible.


When I see the glass windows of buildings on my way home,
I see prophecy. 

Oracle. 

My own projections playing out 
an entire narrative onto the scene. 

To stop the thoughts feels like 
death.

		So why bother? 

The mind police haven’t caught me yet.
"
